item.title: Intel earnings bring more questions than answers, sending the stock lower
item.description: Analysts think Intel’s commentary signaled openness to cutting its foundry business later on, but, for now, there’s uncertainty around the company’s f...

item.title: ‘The selling agent is long dead’: My $250,000 term life-insurance policy costs $2,000 a month. I’m 80. Is it time to ditch it?
item.description: “I took out a $250,000 policy for a 10-year term. At the time, the payments were $200 per month.”

item.title: How much will your next hospital stay cost? No one seems to know — new rules may help.
item.description: How much will your next hospital stay cost? The answer is still unclear — but new rules may help.

item.title: Is this the Nvidia of nuclear power? The stock has soared almost 400% in the past year.
item.description: NuScale Power has the government support, the technology and the financial backing to succeed. Will that be enough?

item.title: Speculative trading is booming again. That could turn into a headwind for the S&P 500, says Goldman Sachs.
item.description: Investors have been piling into highly risky shares.
